The white mace is a weapon with equal stats to the Black mace, but requires completion of Wanted! and 10 Attack to wield it. Players can purchase it from Sir Vyvin after achieving the rank of Noble (500 Black knight kills), or buy from another player.

As with all black and white equipment, the White mace cannot be made from raw materials using the Smithing skill.

[[File:White mace detail.png|left|120px]]
The '''white mace''' is a [[weapon]] with equal stats to the [[Black mace]], but requires completion of [[Wanted!]] and 10 [[Attack]] to wield it. Players can purchase it from [[Sir Vyvin]] after achieving the [[White Knight rank|rank]] of Noble (500 [[Black knight]] kills), or buy from another player.

As with all [[Black equipment|black]] and [[white equipment]], the White mace cannot be made from raw materials using the [[Smithing]] skill.
